Articles.Content:
Introducing World & Pirate Flags. Flags for 212 Earth Countries and 8 Historical Pirate Flags.

Want to claim Kerbal Space for your Country? Here is your Decal Pack to make it happen.

Download:

World & Pirate Flags

Edit: All flags updated to HD. Now contains 228 Flags.

Edited May 25, 2013 by BuzZBladE
Update
awesome, every country should have a space program!
Thank you, with the care of life loss next to nothing and the commonalty of Rocket and Plane Explosions, North Korea's flag fits KSP perfectly.

Thank you, with the care of life loss next to nothing and the commonalty of Rocket and Plane Explosions, North Korea's flag fits KSP perfectly.

...wait, that would also explain why all of them have the same last name. There are only about 250 korean last names in use at all.

...wait, that would also explain why all of them have the same last name. There are only about 250 korean last names in use at all.

I didn't know that, Wow.

Nice work, you're faster than me, I was making my flag pack too.

Just think you forgot french flag (can't find it) and may be add USSR flag too (even if it doesn't exist anymore).

The resolution of the flags could be higher...I think flags taken from wikipedia are copyright free aren't they?

And maybe no one cares but the flag of burma is outdated...they started to use a new one in late 2010
Thanks for reporting that. Added France and USSR, I had skipped the french flag sorry about that.

just what i was looking for...

i loves this forum

i loves you peeps
Thank you. Exactly what i was looking for.

just what i was looking for...

i loves this forum

i loves you peeps

i started laughing, bc when you said this it made me think about how bad the bf3 community is. Here it seems more about help than just slamming someone bc they dont know how to play, or have a different style of playing

Nice But why are the flags blurry? In the wikimedia commons you find the category SVG sovereign state flags, although the category has Ã¢â‚¬Å“onlyÃ¢â‚¬Â 196 while your directory has 214. Now I don't know what the specifications for a flags are but as they are vector graphics you should be able to convert them into any size needed.

Fabian
Added Wales for Syndic, also 75% of the flags are now 100% less blurry.

Added Wales for Syndic, also 75% of the flags are now 100% less blurry.

Yay HD Flags.

Nice, but I'm unable to extract C??te_d'Ivoire:

caution: filename not matched: GameData/WorldFlags/Flags/C\?\?te_d'Ivoire.png

But I can extract the other files and they look awesome, although there is some kind of lightcolored border? My image preview window has a black background and you can easily see it with Belgium or Afghanistan that the black parts have a grey stripe on the left.

And would it be possible to add fictional flags, like UFP.

Fabian
Thank you so much for the effort in putting those flags together!

Added Wales for Syndic, also 75% of the flags are now 100% less blurry.

Would it be possible to add individual England, Scotland, Northern Ireland flags as well?

[edit] and the UK Space Agency, NASA, ESA and ROSCOSMOS, JAXA and CNSA flags?

Edited March 15, 2014 by kerbonaut101
Finnaly found some good flags! I waited this thing!
